base
Interface Game

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
Play
public interface Game
extends java.rmi.Remote

Game Interface The Game represents the Stein game, with the players, the move and the outcome.

Version:
1.0
Author:
runar & alex
